price: Je! Ni vigumu zaidi kukuumbeni nyinyi au mbingu? Yeye ndiye aliye ijenga!
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا
footnotes: Enyi mnao kanya kufufuliwa! Kukuumbeni nyinyi ni taabu zaidi au kuziumba mbingu, kuzikusanya sehemu zake zilio tawanyika mbali mbali,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami al-samāu banāhā
